content: *experiment with unique construction with this lace baby cardigan lionbrand com * lion brand pattern # 90462ad corrections applied jun 23 2011 skill level experienced size size 3-9 months 12-24 months 2-3 years 3-4 years finished chest 23 25 27 28 1/2 in 58 5 63 5 68 5 72 5 cm finished length 9 9 3/4 10 1/4 10 3/4 in 23 25 26 27 5 cm 920-099 babysoft yarn cream 1-2 balls construction schematics are provided *lionbrand com notes * top is worked in one piece from lower back edge up to shoulder the piece is then divided and the right front worked the left front is then worked directly onto the completed piece edging is worked around the entire outside edge of top the edging will add width and length to the fronts and back after the edging is worked sleeves are worked directly onto the top
